root.name: Men of War: Condemned Heroes
root.description: OverviewMen of War: Condemned Heroes is the fourth stand-alone expansion of Men of War, with this expansion based on the soldiers in Stalin's 'No step back!' Order #227. These were court-marshalled officers given a chance at redeeming themselves by being the front line of the battalion and taking on the most dangerous of tasks.System RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP(SP1), Windows Vista or Windows 7Processor: P4 2.6GHz (Athlon 3000+)Memory: 1GBVideo card: GeForce 6600 (Radeon 1950) 128MbSound card: DirectX compatible sound cardHard disk: 3 GB free hard disk space
